title: peruvadurudi
sahitya:
peruvadurudi manamE murugan pEraruLai nI


anupallavi

  garuvam kurukkiDAdu kavalai urukkum pOdu sharaNam enravan tiruvaDi paNIndAl


caraNam    meccum vaghaiyil oru iccai uruvAnAl eccam inri adu niccaiyam niraivura
accam inri nI paccai bAlakan pOl accA enravanai aNugik-kenjinAl
